titleStmt.title: LXXX sermons preached by that learned and reverend divine, Iohn Donne, Dr in Divinity, late Deane of the cathedrall church of S. Pauls London
titleStmt.author: Donne, John, 1572-1631.
Donne, John, 1604-1662.
Merian, Matthaeus, 1593-1650, engraver.
Walton, Izaak, 1593-1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Miles Flesher] for Richard Royston, in Ivie-lane, and Richard Marriot in S. Dunstans Church-yard in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Editor's dedication signed: Jo: Donne, i.e. John Donne the younger.
With the life of the author by Izaak Walton.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
With an additional title page, engraved, signed "M Merian Iun:". The portrait has "Ætat: .42." in the frame. Variant: plate in early state, lacking these two words.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
